text: Oasis is a 1955 French German adventure movie directed by Yves Allégret and based on the novel The Commander by John Knittel. It stars Michèle Morgan, Cornell Brothers, Pierre Brasseur and was distributed by 20th Century Fox. ==Other websites== * * Category:1955 adventure movies Category:French adventure movies Category:German adventure movies Category:Movies set in deserts Category:Movies set in Morocco Category:Movies based on books Category:Movies directed by Yves Allégret Category:20th Century Fox movies
title: Oasis (1955 movie)
